reviewText: I love the relationships between the characters, and the fanservice is super yummy! Lots of breasts and panties. Also, I like the characters' backstory's, and I like Sorata himself. Another thing that makes this anime special to me is that the characters are adults teachers instead of high school students, and also, while he is shy, he ISN'T a virgin, and he isn't evil despite the fact that he's a thief. I can't say much wore without spoiling anything.EDIT: I just got this in yesterday. This image is the picture for the first dvd holder. The actual boxset cover is different, but you still get this picture when you buy it. It's worth it.
Title: Mouse - Complete Collection

reviewText: Mouse was one of my first Anime featues. I didn't care much for the plots, and the character movement for action sequences was terrible. I did like the clarity and artistic drawings of the characters and their rather overdeveloped......personalities!
Title: Mouse - Complete Collection

reviewText: To be fair to the creators of this. I should have known what I was purchasing from the cover.It wasn't horrible but it is the first anime that I purchased that I didn't watch in its entirety. In a nutshell it is pretty shallow entertainment.It kind of reminds me of Lupin 3rd (but not as funny and not as intelligent) with an aim at the "adult" humor, without the adult content.It is lacking because it isn't so adult one could call it Hentai, and the approach the artist/story tellers took to "rewarding" his staff is just juvenile.Also, the stories are just not very good. The story telling is not very solid. It was kind of insulting to ones intelligence... This review might be a bit rough but in some parts it really makes one think "Oh man why did I buy this?".It is like some conceptual cross between Lupin & DNAngel that just feels like a low quality adult story without the adult content.My wife and I watched the first couple episodes and just couldn't watch anymore the blatant sexual advances of his "triple D cupped" "cat-girl" "helpers" just seems out of place and a obvious attempt at creating sexuality where none exists...If you're young I could see how this would appeal but an older crowd (I'm 35) should really pass this one up.
Title: Mouse - Complete Collection

reviewText: got it at the Bestbuy store.I must say that this is a very cool anime. It's about a guy who is the 20th generation of his family who has gone under the guise of Mouse, a thief out to snag treasures. By day he's a mild-mannered art teacher, but at night he becomes the mysterious thief assisted and served by three buxom beauties.The whole thing is 90 minutes inside one Disc and very convenient to watch.  Just click the main menu. and you can discover what it has.
Title: Mouse - Complete Collection

reviewText: I picked this up at my local Best Buys yesterday for $20, read the back of it and thought that it sounded pretty sweet.I must say that this is a very cool anime.  It's about a guy who is the 20th generation of his family who has gone under the guise of Mouse, a thief out to snag treasures.  By day he's a mild-mannered art teacher, but at night he becomes the mysterious thief assisted and served by three buxom beauties.This box set contains 2 DVD's with a special "preiew" disc for the show Voltron: Defender of the Universe.  There is in total 12 episodes for the entire series, however, the real bite is that the episodes only last 12-13 minutes so it goes by really fast.  Another bad thing about the show is that it seems that every theft is broken into 2 episodes, so really, there are only 6 actual thefts in the show.Oh, did I neglect to mention that this show is chock full of nudity?  There is all kinds of breast, bra, panty, and butt shots throughout the entire series.  However, it adds comedy to the show (in my opinion) because the three buxom assistants always seem to have 1 thing on their mind other than assisting their master with his thefts and that's SEX.I am disappointed in the fact that the series itself is so short and the indivual episodes themselves are even shorter.
Title: Mouse - Complete Collection

reviewText: Mouse is a master thief  and there's nothing he cant snatch!  although this is only a 12 episode show I laughed at every episode and it was worth every penny! if you shop around you'll be able to pick up the show for a good price. As far as the show goes if you like beautiful flirtatious girls and a funny story of a school teacher/secret thief with three beautiful girls who call him master you'll enjoy this!
Title: Mouse - Complete Collection
